milkdown.data:
# How to Log In to the Arivix System

Welcome to Arivix, your intelligent assistant platform for automating workflows, booking appointments, and integrating AI-powered agents into your systems. This guide walks you through the step-by-step process to successfully log in to the Arivix system using either a web browser or a mobile device.

---

## ðŸ” Step 1: Navigate to the Login Page

Open your preferred browser and go to the official Arivix login URL:

ðŸ‘‰ [https://app.arivix.ai/login](https://app.arivix.ai/login)

If you are using a custom enterprise domain (e.g., yourcompany.arivix.ai), make sure to visit the correct subdomain as provided by your admin.


---

## ðŸ§‘‍ðŸ’¼ Step 2: Enter Your Credentials

Once on the login screen, you will see two fields:

- *Email Address: Enter the email associated with your Arivix account.
- **Password*: Type your password carefully. Arivix uses strong encryption for user protection, but incorrect attempts may lead to lockouts.

> ðŸ’¡ Tip: Use a password manager to auto-fill your credentials if you forget them.

---

## ðŸ” Step 3: Use SSO or Social Login (Optional)

If your organization has enabled Single Sign-On (SSO) using Google, Microsoft, or other identity providers, you will see buttons like:

- Sign in with Google
- Sign in with Microsoft
- Continue with SSO

Click the appropriate option and follow the OAuth2 flow to log in securely.

> ðŸ“¢ Note: If you don't see these options, your organization may not have enabled SSO.

---

## ðŸ›¡ Step 4: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)

If 2FA is enabled on your account, youâ€™ll be prompted to enter a verification code sent via:

- *Email
- **SMS
- **Authenticator App* (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy)

Once the 6-digit code is entered, click Verify to proceed.

> ðŸ” Donâ€™t share your 2FA code with anyoneâ€”even Arivix support.

---

## ðŸ’» Step 5: Dashboard Access

After successful login, youâ€™ll be redirected to the Arivix Dashboard. This is your control center where you can:

- View and manage AI Agents
- Configure tool integrations (e.g., Slack, Notion, Google Calendar)
- Monitor logs and analytics
- Access Knowledge Bases and Workspaces
- Invite other users or manage your organization settings

> ðŸ“Š Your role (Super Admin, Admin, or Contributor) will determine which modules you can access.

---

## â“ Troubleshooting Login Issues

Here are some common login problems and how to resolve them:

| Issue                        | Solution                                                                 |
|-----------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Forgot Password             | Click on Forgot Password on the login page and follow the reset steps.|
| Email not recognized        | Ensure youâ€™re using the correct email or contact your workspace admin.  |
| 2FA code not received       | Check spam folders or use a backup method if available.                 |
| Account Locked              | Too many failed attempts? Wait 15 minutes or reach out to support.     |

---

## ðŸ†˜ Need Help?

If you're still unable to access your account, contact Arivix Support:

- *Email: support@arivix.ai
- **Live Chat: Available on [https://arivix.ai](https://arivix.ai)
- **Help Center: [https://docs.arivix.ai](https://docs.arivix.ai)

> âœ… Youâ€™re now ready to log in and start building your own intelligent agents with Arivix.
